name: She Who Once Was Lost
description:
SHE WHO ONCE WAS LOST

---
"She?"
"Who is She?"

---
"She is memories, voices, faces, hopes that scattered long ago,"
"Just go, follow the trail of Her past light."

"Everyone need Her."
"She need Herself."

---
"...Yes."

---
"Be safe, little one. May you find the path through Her."

The game is still in Pre-Alpha. Bugs, glitches, writing error, coffee stain, dog fur may occurs. Please send us your comment and feedback to contact@mojikenstudio.com to help us further on development.
Thank You :)

For more update about this game and others, please check them here :) mojikenstudio.com
